Title: Un bon bock
Plot: A wanderer comes into a cabaret in the countryside and asks for a glass of beer to a waitress. It is visible that she appeals to him. When the waitress comes back with the beer, the wanderer begins to court her. Meanwhile the kitchen boy comes, drinks the beer unnoticed and vanishes. The wanderer, misunderstanding, asks for another beer. Then a traveler enters and has an argument with the wanderer. During the argument, the kitchen boy appears, drinks up the second beer and runs away. The customer finds his glass empty again, as the traveler quits. He calls the waitress, expresses his disappointment and leaves. The kitchen boy comes in and explains to the waitress what he did with the two beers. They make fun together on the wanderer and leave.
